channel.title: Exiled-Nation VPS-Paid Webhost-New And Old skool Items, Monsters and more!
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HyGFK.png[/img]
[B]Forums: [URL=http://"http://exiled-nation.com"]Forums[/URL][/B] [B]WebClient: [URL=http://"http://exiled-nation.com/Exile-Forum/index.php?page=Webclient"]WebClient[/URL][/B]
[COLOR="#008000"] Why join us? Read about us! - New rarely seen Home - Farming works 95% like rs - Slayer fixed amount of tasks - Weekly updates! - nex - WEbsite paid host - vps! - fixed up combat works 100% - Dicing works 95% (should be fixed 100% v2) - You can request help by typing ::request - changed donorshops (added donor point store) - Chill zone added ::chill - lotto game have to find lottie at home and talk to her - added donor capes [COLOR="#00FF00"]green[/COLOR] one gives [COLOR="#00FF00"]2x[/COLOR] exp and [COLOR="#FF0000"]red [/COLOR]one that gives [COLOR="#FF0000"]4x[/COLOR] exp - lots of useful commands - All prayers are correct work correctly - noted rocktails that unnote in bank - fixed up thieving - made farming better - changed pkp shops - Dupes Fixed so the eco stay good - Loyalty Ranks -602 Anims/Gfx/ -Chaotics/Spirit Shields/PVP Armours -Tormented Demons -All skills working except some skills arent 100% yet.. -Every special works. -Good/Decent Economy. -Pking/PvP. -Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects -Clan Chat -Working SkillCape emotes. -All ancient spells work, all modern combat spells work, and Vengeance works. -Donator options. Including donator zone teleport/switch spellbook/full killcount. -3 Donator shops + Portals. -Custom Quest Tab. -Reset Levels at home. -PK Point/Slayer Points, and Shops for them. -Bosses like Jad, General Graardor, Kree, Corpal, Nomad, Giant sea snake, lakhrahnaz, Avatar of Destruction Sea troll queen, and more.. -Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena,Zombie Mini Game, Barrows, PC, Tzhaar, Warrior Guild.). -Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching [/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Media:[/COLOR] fggh [/CENTER] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25809031/gif.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/zwzv8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/i4o007.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/118ma6x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/f3s7d5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/6setmv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35jz3mw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qty8pj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://www.google.com/images/server_uploads/15112_15461.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5ttj5h.jpg[/img]

item.dc:creator: @santa_skillz santa skillz
item.description:
@santa_skillz wrote:

Forums: Forums
WebClient: WebClient

[COLOR="#008000"]
Why join us? Read about us!

  • New rarely seen Home
  • Farming works 95% like rs
  • Slayer fixed amount of tasks
  • Weekly updates!
  • nex
  • WEbsite paid host
  • vps!
  • fixed up combat works 100%
  • Dicing works 95% (should be fixed 100% v2)
  • You can request help by typing ::request
  • changed donorshops (added donor point store)
  • Chill zone added ::chill
  • lotto game have to find lottie at home and talk to her
  • added donor capes [COLOR="#00FF00"]green[/COLOR] one gives [COLOR="#00FF00"]2x[/COLOR] exp and [COLOR="#FF0000"]red [/COLOR]one that gives [COLOR="#FF0000"]4x[/COLOR] exp
  • lots of useful commands
  • All prayers are correct work correctly
  • noted rocktails that unnote in bank
  • fixed up thieving
  • made farming better
  • changed pkp shops
  • Dupes Fixed so the eco stay good
  • Loyalty Ranks
    -602 Anims/Gfx/
    -Chaotics/Spirit Shields/PVP Armours
    -Tormented Demons
    -All skills working except some skills arent 100% yet…
    -Every special works.
    -Good/Decent Economy.
    -Pking/PvP.
    -Curse Prayers With Anims/Gfx/Effects
    -Clan Chat
    -Working SkillCape emotes.
    -All ancient spells work, all modern combat spells work, and Vengeance works.
    -Donator options. Including donator zone teleport/switch spellbook/full killcount.
    -3 Donator shops + Portals.
    -Custom Quest Tab.
    -Reset Levels at home.
    -PK Point/Slayer Points, and Shops for them.
    -Bosses like Jad, General Graardor, Kree, Corpal, Nomad, Giant sea snake, lakhrahnaz, Avatar of Destruction
    Sea troll queen, and more…
    -Minigames (Pest Control,Duel Arena,Zombie Mini Game, Barrows, PC, Tzhaar, Warrior Guild.).
    -Hp bar/10x Hit/Hitmarks Switching
